verses.verse: For Zion's <S%H6726><s%> sake will I not hold my peace <S%H2814><s%>, and for Jerusalem's <S%H3389><s%> sake I will not rest <S%H8252><s%>, until the righteousness <S%H6664><s%> thereof go forth <S%H3318><s%> as brightness <S%H5051><s%>, and the salvation <S%H3444><s%> thereof as a lamp <S%H3940><s%> that burneth <S%H1197><s%>.

And the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> thy righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and all kings <S%H4428><s%> thy glory <S%H3519><s%>: and thou shalt be called <S%H7121><s%> by a new <S%H2319><s%> name <S%H5344><s%>, which the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall name <S%H8034><s%>.

Thou shalt also be a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory <S%H8597><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and a royal <S%H4410><s%> diadem <S%H6797><s%> <S%H6797><s%> in the hand <S%H3709><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%>.

Thou shalt no more be termed <S%H559><s%> Forsaken <S%H5800><s%>; neither shall thy land <S%H776><s%> any more be termed <S%H559><s%> Desolate <S%H8077><s%>: but thou shalt be called <S%H7121><s%> Hephzi-bah <S%H2657><s%>, and thy land <S%H776><s%> Beulah <S%H1166><s%>: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delighteth <S%H2654><s%> in thee, and thy land <S%H776><s%> shall be married <S%H1166><s%>.

¶ For as a young man <S%H970><s%> marrieth <S%H1166><s%> a virgin <S%H1330><s%>, so shall thy sons <S%H1121><s%> marry <S%H1166><s%> thee: and as the bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> rejoiceth <S%H4885><s%> over the bride <S%H3618><s%>, so shall thy God <S%H430><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over thee.

I have set <S%H6485><s%> watchmen <S%H8104><s%> upon thy walls <S%H2346><s%>, O Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, which shall never <S%H8548><s%> hold their peace <S%H2814><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> nor night <S%H3915><s%>: ye that make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, keep not silence <S%H1824><s%>,
And give <S%H5414><s%> him no rest <S%H1824><s%>, till he establish <S%H3559><s%>, and till he make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a praise <S%H8416><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> by his right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and by the arm <S%H2220><s%> of his strength <S%H5797><s%>, Surely I will <S%H518><s%> no more give <S%H5414><s%> thy corn <S%H1715><s%> to be meat <S%H3978><s%> for thine enemies <S%H341><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the stranger <S%H5236><s%> shall not drink <S%H8354><s%> thy wine <S%H8492><s%>, for the which thou hast laboured <S%H3021><s%>:

But they that have gathered <S%H622><s%> it shall eat <S%H398><s%> it, and praise <S%H1984><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and they that have brought it together <S%H6908><s%> shall drink <S%H8354><s%> it in the courts <S%H2691><s%> of my holiness <S%H6944><s%>.

¶ Go through <S%H5674><s%>, go through <S%H5674><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%>; prepare <S%H6437><s%> ye the way <S%H1870><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; cast up <S%H5549><s%>, cast up <S%H5549><s%> the highway <S%H4546><s%>; gather out <S%H5619><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%>; lift up <S%H7311><s%> a standard <S%H5251><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>.

Behold, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath proclaimed <S%H8085><s%> unto the end <S%H7097><s%> of the world <S%H776><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> ye to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, Behold, thy salvation <S%H3468><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%>; behold, his reward <S%H7939><s%> is with him, and his work <S%H6468><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And they shall call <S%H7121><s%> them, The holy <S%H6944><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, The redeemed <S%H1350><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and thou shalt be called <S%H7121><s%>, Sought out <S%H1875><s%>, A city <S%H5892><s%> not forsaken <S%H5800><s%>.
